pci_app_add_configuration_label_descript: You can add labels to your AI App. Useful for filtering or securing by token on a specific label
pci_app_add_privacy_settings_item_restri: Access to your AI App is restricted by authentication.
pci_app_add_privacy_settings_item_public: Your AI App is accessible to everyone through your URL or API. Anyone can access your application and the data attached to it.
Please ensure that you take great care with sensitive data.
pci_app_add_privacy_title: Access rule to your AI App
pci_app_add_settings_port_help: The HTTP port your AI App is linked to.
